Brief:          This is an implementation of the Hypertext Transfer Protocol version 2 in C.
Usage:          GCC: Include the module with "include $(SOURCE_DIR)/middleware/third_party/nghttp2/module.mk" in your GCC project Makefile.
                KEIL: Drag the middleware/third_party/nghttp2 folder to your project. Add middleware/third_party/nghttp2/lib and middleware/third_party/nghttp2/lib/includes/nghttp2 to include paths.
                IAR: Drag the middleware/third_party/nghttp2 folder to your project. Add middleware/third_party/nghttp2/lib and middleware/third_party/nghttp2/lib/includes/nghttp2 to include paths.
Dependency:     This module has the dependency with LwIP. Please also make sure to include LwIP.
Notice:         None.
Relative doc:   Please refer to the open source user guide under the doc folder for more detail.
Example project:Please find the project under project folder with nghttp2_ prefix.
